name: MeganMOtis.com
tagline: The personal portfolio of Megan M. Otis
body:
### About Me
I am a novice web developer based in the Pacific Northwest. I am currently a student in the Web Development Certificate program at Seattle University. 

I am a cultural anthropologist; I received my Master's degree in anthropology from Western Washington University in 2011. (Not that you would want to, but you can read my Master's thesis on the WWU Library website here.)

I am also a published scholar in the field of _the scholarship of teaching and learning (SoTL)_ and I am a co-editor and co-author of the 2009 book _Engaging Student Voices in the Study of Teaching and Learning_ from Stylus Publishing.

### Contact Me
Send me an email or find me on Twitter, LinkedIn, Google+, and Github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
